title: 商谈代理事宜Discuss the representation

conversations.english: I think you know already that I want to discuss the representation for your alarm clocks.
conversations.chinese: 想必你已知道，我想和你商谈你方闹钟的代理问题。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, Mr. Bergerson. You mentioned that in your letter. To tell you the truth, your proposal surprised us.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，博格森先生，你在信中有提到。说实话，你方的建议使我们有些意外。

title: 请戴上安全帽Put on the helmet

conversations.english: Put on the helmet, please.
conversations.chinese: 请戴上安全帽。
conversations.reply_english: Do we need to put on the jackets too?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们还得穿上罩衣吗？

conversations.english: It was very kind of you to give me a tour of the place. It gave me a good idea of your product range.
conversations.chinese: 谢谢你们陪同我看了整个工厂。这次参观使我对你们的产品范围有了一个很好的了解。
conversations.reply_english: It’s a pleasure to show our factory to our customers. What’s your general impression, may I ask?
conversations.reply_chinese: 带我们的客户来参观工厂是我们的荣幸。不知道你总体印象如何？

conversations.english: I'm pleased to meet you again, Mrs. King.
conversations.chinese: 很高兴又见到你，金夫人。
conversations.reply_english: Pleased to see you, too, Mr. Brown.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也很高兴见到你，布朗先生。

conversations.english: Star Flooring, how may I direct your call?
conversations.chinese: Star地板材料公司。您找谁？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like to speak to someone in the Purchasing Department.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我找采购部的人。

title: 签独家代理协议Sole agency agreement

conversations.english: First of all, I would like to thank you for your kind invitation to visit your beautiful country. I hope my visit will help to promote a friendly relationship between us.
conversations.chinese: 首先，我想感谢你盛情邀请我访问你们美丽的国家。我希望这次 访问将有助于促进我们之间的友好关系。
conversations.reply_english: We've been looking forward to your visit. It is a great pleasure for us to have you as our guest. It is always more convenient to discuss things face to face.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们一直在盼着你的到来。有你来做客，真是我们的荣幸。面对 面的谈判总是比较方便。

conversations.english: Well, we've settled the question of price, quality and quantity. Now what about the terms of payment?
conversations.chinese: 好吧，既然价格、质量和数量问题都已谈妥，现在来谈谈付款方式怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: We only accept payment by irrevocable letter of credit payable against shipping documents.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们只接受不可撤消的、凭装运单据付款的信用证。

conversations.english: That price of ours, by the way, is for a minimum quantity of 1,000 saddles.
conversations.chinese: 顺便说一下，我们的价格是针对最小量为1000个车座而言的。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I noticed that. To what extent would local assembly help sales, did you say?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我注意到了。你说本地装配能在多大程度上促进销售呢？

title: 请给我一次合作的机会

conversations.english: Hello,come in , I've been waiting for you.
conversations.chinese: 嗨，请进，我等你好久了。
conversations.reply_english: Than you, I'm not late,am I ?
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，我没有迟到吧？

conversations.english: I’m so frustrated!
conversations.chinese: 真扫兴！
conversations.reply_english: what’s wrong,Jim?
conversations.reply_chinese: 怎么了，Jim?

conversations.english: How large is the plant?
conversations.chinese: 这个工厂有多大？
conversations.reply_english: It covers an area of 75,000 square meters.
conversations.reply_chinese: 面积有七万五千平方米。

conversations.english: I can promise you that, if you buy our product, you will be getting quality.
conversations.chinese: 我可以向你保证，如果你买了我们的产品，你会得到好品质。
conversations.reply_english: I’ve looked at your units, and I am very happy with them. Your goods are all far above standard quality.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我看过你们的单件，我很满意。你们的商品质量高过标准质量。

conversations.english: What happens if we make a deal and thirty to sixty days after delievery the price goes down and you didn't get the best possible price?How do I handle that?
conversations.chinese: 如果我们达成了交易,但交货的30~60天内,市面降价,导致你的价格不是最好的,该怎么办?我要如何处理?
conversations.reply_english: Well,these things happens,I know that. You just have to stay straight with me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯,这是难免的,你只要直接告知我就可以了.

conversations.english: It has just occurred to me that there is still another possibility to ensure a prompt delivery of the goods.
conversations.chinese: 我刚想起来了，还有一种可能性确保即期交货。
conversations.reply_english: And that is?
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么可能性？

conversations.english: I wish to make it clear at the outset that this matter of labels is entirely our problem.
conversations.chinese: 我希望从一开始就想说明标签的事情完全是我们的问题。
conversations.reply_english: I should say it is something we have never come across before.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我得说这个问题是我们从来没有遇到过的。

conversations.english: Mr. Jones, shall we now discuss the packaging?
conversations.chinese: 琼斯先生，我们来谈谈包装好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Very well. You know, we have definite ways of packaging garments. As to blouses, we use a polythene wrapper for each article, all ready for window display.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好。你知道，我们对服装包装有特定的方式。至于女衫，一件装一个聚乙烯口袋，可直接放在橱窗里陈列。

conversations.english: Welcome to China, Mr. White.
conversations.chinese: 怀特先生，欢迎来中国。
conversations.reply_english: How do you do, Ms. Chi?
conversations.reply_chinese: Chi女士，您好吗?

title: 想知道包装的具体情况

conversations.english: Hi, Mr. Brown, we have visited the factories and I'm very satisfied with your factories production conditions.
conversations.chinese: 嗨，布朗先生，我们已参观了工厂，并对你们工厂的生产条件很满意。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, they are our main export bases of tools with the advantage of having good production experience and long historical record. All their products enjoy high prestige in the world market.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，这些厂生产经验丰富，历史悠久，是我们工具出口的主要生产厂家。所有产品在国际市场上享有很高的声誉。

title: 能否想些办法提前交货

conversations.english: Could you do something to advance your time of shipment?
conversations.chinese: 你们能否想些办法提前交货？
conversations.reply_english: Well, our manufacturers are fully committed at the moment. I'm afraid it's very difficult to improve any further on the time.
conversations.reply_chinese: 但我们的厂家眼前都很忙，要再提前恐怕很难。

conversations.english: Sandrawu Chunk International.
conversations.chinese: Sandrawu Chunk 国际公司.
conversations.reply_english: Hello, Miss Wu, This is Dan Robson calling from OTC limited. I'd like to check my last order. When exactly was it sent out?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好,吴小姐. 我是OTC有限公司的Alex Robson. 我要查最近我这次的订单,货是什么时候送出的?

conversations.english: I’m glad you could find time to meet with me, Mr. Johnson. I can’t think of a nicer environment for our meeting today, the ambiance here is lovely!
conversations.chinese: 很高兴，你能找到时间来见我，约翰先生，我想不出会面的更好环境了，这儿的环境很不错。
conversations.reply_english: No problem, if possible I always combine business with pleasure. Now, let’s hear more about these chocolates you’re offering.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没问题，如果可能，我总是将买卖和乐趣融合起来。现在，我们来听听你们提供的巧克力。
